questions.question_text: What is the purpose of the Application Picker?

choices.D: Choose an application to download and install
choices.C: Choose an application to edit and set the Application Scope
choices.B: Select an application as a favorite in the Application Navigator

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
Application Files is the related list under an application record. It contains all artifacts that are part of that application.
C is the correct answer
Application files are configuration records that allow developers to extend application functionality.

Selected Answer: C
https://docs.servicenow.com/bundle/vancouver-application-development/page/build/applications/concept/c_ApplicationFiles.html

questions.question_text: What are Application Files in a ServiceNow application?

choices.D: XML exports of an application's Update Set
choices.B: CSV files containing data imported into an application
choices.A: An XML export of an application's table records

discussion.content:

questions.question_text: Which one of the following is true for the Application Picker?

choices.D: Only downloaded applications appear in the Application Picker
choices.A: All custom application scope and the Global scope appear in the Application Picker
choices.C: Only custom applications appear in the Application Picker
choices.B: All applications in ServiceNow, including baseline applications like Incident, appear in the Application Picker
